text: Jack Dylan Grazer (born September 3, 2003) is an American actor. He has played the role of Eddie Kaspbrak in the 2017 and 2019 movie versions of the Stephen King novel It. He also played Freddy Freeman in the 2006 DC Extended Universe movie Shazam! and voiced Alberto in the 2008 Disney Pixar movie Luca. Ron's Gone Wrong In July 2021, Grazer came out as bisexual.
